hero.title: Your Perfect
hero.subtitle: Experience exceptional dental care with our team of expert dentists. Modern technology, comfortable environment, and personalized treatment for every patient.

team.title: Meet Our
team.subtitle: Our experienced dental professionals are committed to providing you with the highest quality care in a comfortable and welcoming environment.

footer.description: Your trusted partner for comprehensive dental care. We provide exceptional dental services with a focus on comfort, quality, and patient satisfaction.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Dedicated to providing exceptional dental care with compassion, expertise, and the latest technology for over 15 years.
about.storyParagraph1: Founded in 2008 by Dr. Marko Zebekov, Dental Center Zebekov began with a simple yet powerful vision: to provide world-class dental care that combines advanced technology with genuine compassion.
about.storyParagraph2: What started as a small practice in Skopje has grown into Macedonia's premier dental center, serving thousands of patients across two convenient locations. Our commitment to excellence has never wavered, and we continue to invest in the latest technology and training to ensure our patients receive the best possible care.
about.storyParagraph3: Today, we're proud to be recognized as leaders in dental innovation, offering comprehensive services from routine cleanings to complex surgical procedures, all delivered with the personal touch that has made us a trusted name in Macedonian dentistry.
about.valuesSubtitle: These core values guide everything we do and shape the exceptional experience we provide to every patient.

patientCenteredCare.title: Patient-Centered Care
patientCenteredCare.description: Every decision we make is focused on what's best for our patients' health and comfort.

qualitySafety.title: Quality & Safety
qualitySafety.description: We maintain the highest standards of quality and safety in all our treatments.

professionalExcellence.title: Professional Excellence
professionalExcellence.description: Our team continuously updates their skills to provide the most advanced care.

continuousLearning.title: Continuous Learning
continuousLearning.description: We stay at the forefront of dental innovation through ongoing education.

about.journeySubtitle: From humble beginnings to becoming Macedonia's leading dental practice, here's our story of growth and innovation.

2008.title: Foundation
2008.description: Dr. Marko Zebekov established the first clinic in Skopje with a vision to provide world-class dental care.

2012.title: Expansion
2012.description: Opened our second location in Ohrid to serve patients across Macedonia.

2016.title: Technology Upgrade
2016.description: Invested in state-of-the-art digital equipment and modern treatment methods.

2020.title: Team Growth
2020.description: Expanded our team with specialized dentists in various fields of dentistry.

2024.title: Innovation Leader
2024.description: Became the leading dental practice in Macedonia with cutting-edge treatments.

about.achievementsSubtitle: Recognition and milestones that reflect our commitment to excellence in dental care and patient satisfaction.

awardWinning.title: Award-Winning Practice
awardWinning.description: Recognized for excellence in dental care and patient satisfaction.

modernTechnology.title: Modern Technology
modernTechnology.description: Equipped with the latest dental technology for optimal results.

happyPatients.title: 5000+ Happy Patients
happyPatients.description: Trusted by thousands of patients across Macedonia.

experience.title: 15+ Years Experience
experience.description: Over a decade of providing exceptional dental care.

about.joinDescription: Experience the difference that personalized, professional dental care can make. Schedule your appointment today and discover why thousands of patients trust us with their smiles.

services.title: Our
services.subtitle: Comprehensive dental care with state-of-the-art technology and personalized treatment plans for every patient.
services.whyChooseSubtitle: We combine advanced technology with personalized care to deliver exceptional dental experiences.

advancedTechnology.title: Advanced Technology
advancedTechnology.description: State-of-the-art equipment for precise and comfortable treatments.

personalizedCare.title: Personalized Care
personalizedCare.description: Tailored treatment plans designed specifically for your needs.

expertTeam.title: Expert Team
expertTeam.description: Experienced professionals with specialized training and certifications.

flexibleScheduling.title: Flexible Scheduling
flexibleScheduling.description: Convenient appointment times that fit your busy lifestyle.

dentalMedicine.name: Dental Medicine
dentalMedicine.description: Comprehensive dental care including cleanings, fillings, and routine checkups.

aestheticDentistry.name: Aesthetic Dentistry
aestheticDentistry.description: Transform your smile with our advanced cosmetic dental procedures.

orthodontics.name: Orthodontics
orthodontics.description: Straighten your teeth with traditional braces or modern clear aligners.

oralSurgery.name: Oral Surgery
oralSurgery.description: Expert surgical procedures including extractions and implant placement.

implantology.name: Implantology
implantology.description: Expert surgical procedures including extractions and implant placement.

prostheticDentistry.name: Prosthetic Dentistry
prostheticDentistry.description: Gentle, specialized dental care designed specifically for children.

xrayDiagnostics.name: X-Ray Diagnostics
xrayDiagnostics.description: 24/7 emergency dental services for urgent dental problems.

services.readyDescription: Schedule your consultation today and take the first step towards optimal oral health and a beautiful smile.

locations.title: Our
locations.subtitle: Visit us at our convenient locations in Skopje and Ohrid. Modern facilities with the latest dental technology.
locations.mapSubtitle: Both of our locations are easily accessible and offer convenient parking options for our patients.
locations.visitDescription: Choose the location that's most convenient for you and experience the difference of quality dental care.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Ready to schedule your appointment? Get in touch with us today. We're here to answer your questions and help you achieve your perfect smile.
contact.formDescription: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you within 24 hours to confirm your appointment.
contact.getInTouchDescription: We're here to help you with all your dental needs. Contact us through any of the methods below or visit us at one of our convenient locations.

form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your dental needs or any questions you have...

contact.thankYouMessage: Your message has been sent successfully. We'll contact you soon!

emergencyContact.title: Emergency Contact
emergencyContact.description: For dental emergencies outside business hours:

contact.visitDescription: Find us at our convenient locations in Skopje and Ohrid. Both clinics offer the same high-quality care and modern facilities.
